name: NightX
description:
NightX is a game in which you have to survive.

My idea is to recreate minecraft or a similar game with pretty good graphics, new mechanics and other cool features.

The game is free at this stage. If I see the interest of people in this project, then I will create a launcher for this game, and distribute the keys to all subscribed players.

The game is under development, but it already has a bunch of mechanics!

Thanks to everyone who looked and subscribed.
